# QRDY Documentation

> QRDY provides powerful tools for Canva users and general productivity. This documentation covers Image to Frames (custom frame creation for Canva) and NoteMe (note-taking and reminder system).

## About Image to Frames

Image to Frames is a Canva app that instantly converts any image (PNG, JPG, or SVG) into a custom frame. Users can convert images with one click, browse 8,168+ premium frames, or create their own custom frames. Perfect for social media posts, map art, text to frames, double exposure effects, and more.

**Key Features:**
- One-click image to frame conversion
- Access to 8,168+ premium frames
- Three ways to use: tap image in Canva, upload file, or import from frame library
- Fully automatic conversion - no manual editing needed
- Supports PNG, SVG, and JPG formats
- Pro subscription required for all features

## Main Documentation Pages

### Getting Started
- /image-to-frames/what-is-image-to-frames : Introduction to Image to Frames - what it is, how it works, and what you can do
- /image-to-frames/getting-started : Step-by-step guide to install and use Image to Frames in Canva. Includes three methods to create frames
- /image-to-frames/create-frame-from-image : Guide to convert images into frames with one click. Fully automatic conversion process

### Using Frames
- /image-to-frames/using-frame-library : Browse and download from 8,168+ premium frames. Search by tags and import frames into Canva
- /image-to-frames/using-frames-in-canva : Complete guide to using frames in Canva designs. Import frames, add images, and create professional designs

### Advanced Topics
- /image-to-frames/pro-features : Pro subscription benefits including unlimited conversions, premium frame library access, and all future features
- /image-to-frames/use-cases : Creative use cases including text to frames, map art, social media posts, double exposure effects, puzzle games
- /image-to-frames/faq : Frequently asked questions about Pro subscription, free trial, features, Canva integration, and troubleshooting

## Key Topics and Keywords

**Primary Keywords:**
- image to frame canva
- trace image to frame
- custom frame maker
- frame mask svg canva
- cut image into frame canva
- convert image to frame
- canva frames
- image to frames

**Use Cases:**
- Text to frames: Convert text images into individual character frames
- Map art: Transform country maps into artwork with embedded images
- Social media posts: Create unique frames for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok
- Double exposure: Create professional double exposure effects
- Puzzle games: Design interactive puzzle pieces for Facebook games
- Product mockups: Showcase products with custom-shaped frames
- Wedding invitations: Create elegant personalized invitations

## Important Information

**Pro Subscription:**
- Annual subscription required (free users cannot access any features)
- Includes unlimited conversions, 8,168+ premium frames, all future updates
- Students and teachers can get free 1-year Pro subscription at https://qrdyai.com/studentpack

**How to Use:**
1. Install Image to Frames app in Canva
2. Choose method: tap image in design, upload file, or import from library
3. Click convert - fully automatic
4. Use frame in Canva design

**Important Notes:**
- Frames downloaded from library must be imported into Image to Frames app in Canva (not just uploaded as regular file)
- Supports PNG, SVG, and JPG formats
- Conversion is fully automatic - no manual tracing or editing needed

## About NoteMe

NoteMe is a note-taking and reminder system that helps users capture everything they need to remember in one place. Users can create notes from mobile app, Canva, or automation workflows (n8n), and access them all from the mobile app.

**Key Features:**
- Create notes and reminders with AI assistance
- Mobile app (iOS, Android, Web) for quick note-taking
- Canva App integration for project notes (Pro required)
- n8n integration for automated note creation
- Tag organization and powerful search
- Calendar view for reminders
- Cross-platform sync

**Platforms:**
- Mobile App: iOS, Android, Web at https://noteme.qrdyai.com
- Canva App: Available in Canva (Pro subscription required)
- n8n Integration: Automate note creation from workflows

## Main Documentation Pages - NoteMe

### Getting Started
- /noteme/what-is-noteme : Introduction to NoteMe - what it is, three ways to use it (mobile, Canva, n8n), and key features
- /noteme/getting-started : Step-by-step guide to set up NoteMe account, download mobile app, and start capturing notes

### Platform Guides
- /noteme/mobile-app : Complete guide to mobile app features - creating notes, setting reminders, using tags, saving links, calendar view
- /noteme/get-free-calendar-maker-code : Special offer - download NoteMe mobile app, create a note with key "calendar", and receive a free 1-month Calendar Maker code instantly
- /noteme/get-student-pack-code : Student verification - download NoteMe mobile app, create a note with key "student", receive Student Pack code, and continue with Qrdy Student verification. Helps receive notifications about new packages and exclusive student codes
- /noteme/canva-app : Guide to using NoteMe in Canva - creating project notes, checklists, reference links (Pro required)
- /noteme/n8n-integration : Setup guide for n8n integration - getting token from settings, configuring workflows, automating note creation

### Advanced Topics
- /noteme/use-cases : Real-world use cases - quick note-taking, appointment reminders, project organization, cross-platform capture
- /noteme/faq : Frequently asked questions about features, pricing, mobile app, Canva integration, n8n automation, troubleshooting

## Key Topics and Keywords - NoteMe

**Primary Keywords:**
- note taking app canva
- reminder app mobile
- ghi chú nhắc việc
- canva notes integration
- note app with reminders
- cross-platform notes
- automated note taking
- note app automation

**Use Cases:**
- Quick note-taking on the go
- Appointment and task reminders
- Project organization in Canva
- Email to notes automation
- Calendar sync and reminders
- Form submission to notes
- Cross-platform note capture

## Important Information - NoteMe

**Pricing:**
- Free plan available with limited number of notes
- Pro plan includes unlimited notes, Canva App access, advanced features
- Pricing varies by platform - visit https://noteme.qrdyai.com for current pricing

**Platforms:**
- Mobile App: iOS, Android, Web - available at https://noteme.qrdyai.com/redirect?go=download
- Canva App: Requires Pro subscription
- n8n Integration: Requires API token from NoteMe settings

**Key Concept:**
NoteMe helps users "send everything you need to remember to yourself" - from manual input to automation - and always reminds you at the right time.

**Special Offers:**

**Calendar Maker:**
- Download NoteMe mobile app and create a note with key "calendar"
- Receive free 1-month Calendar Maker code instantly
- Code applies only to 1-month Calendar Maker subscription plan
- Calendar Maker: Create monthly, weekly, or custom calendars in Canva - https://qrdynamic.xyz/calendarmaker-in-canva

**Student Pack:**
- Download NoteMe mobile app and create a note with key "student"
- Receive Student Pack verification code
- Continue verification process at https://qrdyai.com/studentpack
- Helps receive notifications about new packages, launch dates, and exclusive student codes
